sentence.Network_en: The lecture was as dull as ditchwater.
sentence.Network_cn: 那次讲座非常呆板乏味.

sentence.Network_en: The book I've been reading is as dull as ditchwater, it has no story or any interest at all.
sentence.Network_cn: 我读的这本书乏味得很,根本没有情节, 一点意思也没有.

sentence.Network_en: I tried to read her latest book but found it as dull as ditchwater.
sentence.Network_cn: 我试着读她最新的书,但发现那本书非常单调乏味.
